title: Building Turing‑LLM‑1.0‑254M
abstract: Introducing Turing‑LLM‑1.0‑254M, a novel large language model created for interpretability research purposes. The results presented in this technical report display that this model contains some non-trivial level of intelligence and a general knowledge of the world. The model was built with the help of many resources, including <|references|karpathy_gpt2_video|>.
